```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
```

a) Load the Data
```{r}
#Load and read the data iris dataset
data(iris)
head(iris)
```

b) Summarize the data
```{r}
summary(iris)
```

c)
```{r}
aggregate(Sepal.Length ~ Species, data = iris, mean)
```

d)
```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Sepal.Length, color = Species)) +
geom_point(size = 5) +
labs(title = "Sepal Length vs Petal Length",
x = "Petal Length",
y = "Sepal Length") +
theme_minimal()
```
